aboutHero.title: Welcome to Orlando
aboutHero.subtitle: Your perfect destination for comfort and relaxation
aboutHero.description: We provide a unique experience in the world of luxury chalets, combining comfort, luxury, and exceptional service

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.content: Orlando's journey began in 2020 with a clear vision to provide an exceptional accommodation experience that combines luxury and comfort. We are proud to offer modern chalets equipped with the latest amenities for our valued guests.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We strive to be the first destination for those seeking comfort and relaxation in Saudi Arabia, by providing distinguished services and an unforgettable accommodation experience.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide an exceptional accommodation experience for our guests by paying attention to the finest details and providing the highest standards of quality and service.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We are committed to providing the highest quality standards in every detail of our services

comfort.title: Comfort
comfort.description: We prioritize our guests' comfort and strive to provide everything they need

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: We guarantee our guests the highest levels of privacy and security during their stay

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We always strive to develop our services and provide innovative solutions to improve our guests' experience
